project:
<component name="PhpDebugGeneral" xdebug_debug_port="<%~ it.xDebug3Port%>" ignore_connections_through_unregistered_servers="true"> <xdebug_debug_ports port="<%~ it.xDebug3Port%>" /> <xdebug_debug_ports port="<%~ it.xDebug2Port%>" />
<server host="<%~ it.debugServerAddress%>" id="7e16e907-9ce3-4559-9d26-a30a5650d11f" name="<%~it.serverName%>" />
<configuration name="<%~it.runManagerName%>" type="PhpRemoteDebugRunConfigurationType" factoryName="PHP Remote Debug" filter_connections="FILTER" server_name="<%~it.serverName%>" session_id="<%~it.sessionId%>">
<property name="DatabaseDriversLRU" value="<%~it.databaseDriver%>" />
